meanings.sent1: After getting distracted, she reconcentrates on her homework.
meanings.sent2: He reconcentrates his efforts on finishing the project.
meanings.sent3: The cat reconcentrates on chasing the laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: The sun reconcentrates its rays on the flower in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The teacher reconcentrates the students' attention by telling an interesting story.

meanings.definition: To bring together or gather in one place again.
meanings.sent1: The shepherd reconcentrates the scattered sheep in the field.
meanings.sent2: The event planner reconcentrates the guests in the main hall for the speech.
meanings.sent3: The children reconcentrate the scattered puzzle pieces on the table.
meanings.sent4: The magnet reconcentrates the scattered paper clips on the desk.
meanings.sent5: The chef reconcentrates the ingredients on the cutting board before starting to cook.
